

IF(APPLE)
IF(CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES STREQUAL i386)
ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DMPC_LITTLE_ENDIAN)
ENDIF(CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES STREQUAL i386)
ENDIF(APPLE)
IF(WIN32)
ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DMPC_LITTLE_ENDIAN)
ENDIF(WIN32)
IF(UNIX)
IF(NOT CMAKE_WORDS_BIGENDIAN)
ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DMPC_LITTLE_ENDIAN)
ENDIF(NOT CMAKE_WORDS_BIGENDIAN)
ENDIF(UNIX)
ADD_LIBRARY(mympcdec
	huffsv46.c	
	huffsv7.c	
	idtag.c		
	mpc_decoder.c	
	mpc_reader.c	
	requant.c	
	streaminfo.c	
	synth_filter.c
)
